about_the_game:
Gardening is a tough job, it takes time to upgrade your equipment and your tools, this DLC will give you a head start with an injection of upgrade points

Provides the following benefits:

★ 10,000 Upgrade Points

*Upgrade Points can be gathered ingame by cutting grass
detailed_description:
Gardening is a tough job, it takes time to upgrade your equipment and your tools, this DLC will give you a head start with an injection of upgrade points

Provides the following benefits:

*Upgrade Points can be gathered ingame by cutting grass
name: Grass Cutters Academy - 10,000 Upgrade Points

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Grass Cutters Academy - 10,000 Upgrade Points

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Graphics
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
